about_the_game:
Welcome to 'The Netcode Conflict'

We are working on a massiv futuristic multiplayer survival game in a big persistent Open world. Let`s start with us our development and create with us the next epic game. This Project, where gaming meets community in an unforgettable experience! We're not just about delivering fun and action-packed gameplay; we're all about tailor-making a game that speaks directly to you, our community. Together, we're crafting something truly special – a game that's not just played, but lived and cherished. Join us on this journey, and let's create gaming history together!




Explore a futuristic open world to discover new areas, find items, and improve your defenses against enemies. Be Careful and Loot your Equipment to be Ready for the Battle!


Advance through challenges, earn points and become truly epic. Team up or fight solo to take over the control point system.


Survive to improve your skills and discover special abilities. Be the last man standing and hold the control point system to unlock special features.


In this post-apocalyptic cyberpunk survival shooter, set in a world devastated by war over the "Netcode," you have the choice to go solo, team up with friends, or join one of three major factions. You begin randomly somewhere in the world in a landing pod and start with a unique character (Facade). At first, you start without equipment and must quickly scavenge loot. Drive by car or go by foot to explore the world and get into a city to capture the control point and earn points that make you unique. But be careful, if you die, you lose your equipment and the control point you've captured becomes easier for others to take over.

Step into our world, where passion knows no bounds! Here's the kicker – we're doing all of this without a budget, pouring our hearts and souls into this project during our precious free time. Despite the lack of funds, our dedication knows no limits. So buckle up and get ready to embark on an adventure like no other, fueled purely by love for gaming and community spirit!

name: The Netcode Conflict

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 (4 Kerne oder besser)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 (6 Kerne oder besser)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to 'The Netcode Conflict'! We are working on a futuristic open world survival shooter with an amazing setup. Let`s start with us our development and create with us the next epic game.
